tags: i need the merch but it's too expensive help
summary: Ppl really be out here saying Brie Larson is “racist and sexist” for not wanting popular media to be “overwhelmingly white and...
body:
Ppl really be out here saying Brie Larson is “racist and sexist” for not wanting popular media to be “overwhelmingly white and male” ie wanting media to be full of the voices and presence of POC and female fans and creators

I know it’ll be popular regardless but I can guarantee that going out to watch Captain Marvel and making it a hit will make actual sexists and racists mad and that already justifies price of entry 

But even if not that, I’m excited because early reviews point to a great villain, a great/mindblowing mystery element, and GOOSE THE CAT

So I’m pretty excited to see it

summary: Brie Larson and Captain Marvel haters won't shut their mouths off, they complained about Brie doesn't smiling, we shut up them...
body:
Brie Larson and Captain Marvel haters won’t shut their mouths off, they complained about Brie doesn’t smiling, we shut up them by demonstrating male heroes don’t smile either…

then they claim Brie wasn’t the best option to play Carol Danvers because she is emotionless and can’t act, bitch! please she’s supposed to be brainwashed and they are just trailers !! they won’t show too much,

then twisting Brie’s words into “she hates white heterosexual males, this movie ain’t for me cuz she doesn’t want me there” “wuuwuuwu watch me return my tickets” “that feminazi ain’t getting a dollar from me” “stupid Marvel and Disney they ruining the MCU”

and now they saying Marvel bought the cinemas so CM is the only movie playing March 8?!? DUDE are you stupid or something?! like, honestly have they ever bought thickets for another movies? it’s pre-sale and CM is the only movie premiering that day that’s why you only can buy tickets for that movie that day, but if you go to Cinema that day THERE’S MORE MOVIES SCREENING TOO uhg

if the movie does well at box office they will say it’s fraud etc etc, if the movie doesn’t do that good they’ll never shut up about how right they always were

summary: Yes, Brie Larson bringing Captain Marvel to life and being an inspiring role model to young girls is exactly the same as Adolf...
question: Yes, Brie Larson bringing Captain Marvel to life and being an inspiring role model to young girls is exactly the same as Adolf Hitler taking propaganda pics with kids.Men on Twitter are just absolute geniuses. (I am so angry about that post. I cannot believe men like that really exist.)
answer: The level of ignorance some men are capable of is truly astounding to me. They’re the living embodiment of the “I feel uncomfortable when we’re not about me” tweet.

summary:
Guess what?
I'm going to see Captain Marvel with my straight white brother who's not intimidated by a strong female...
body:
Guess what?

I’m going to see Captain Marvel with my straight white brother who’s not intimidated by a strong female heroine.

Why? ‘Cause he is a man with common sense who grew up with a single working mother that has always been his heroine.

He is a man who respects a hero for being strong and good, not for what they have between their legs.

summary: ‪The same guys who say Captain Marvel is going to ruin The Marvel Cinematic Universe always come off as the type of insecure...
body: ‪The same guys who say Captain Marvel is going to ruin The Marvel Cinematic Universe always come off as the type of insecure guys that can’t handle when their girlfriend succeeds in an area they haven’t. Just get over yourself and be happy for the woman. She’s awesome.‬

summary: Captain Marvel: alcune scene inedite in un nuovo spot!
title: Captain Marvel: alcune scene inedite in un nuovo spot!
body:
Captain Marvel: alcune scene inedite in un nuovo spot!

Il momento del nuovo Capitano arriva nel nuovo spot televisivo per il prossimo film dei Marvel Studios, Captain Marvel.

Lo spot TV mostra Carol Danvers (Brie Larson) che si accende del suo potere. Ospita anche membri di Starforce, tra cui Korath (Djimon Hounsou), visto per la prima volta in Guardiani della Galassia.

Potete guardare lo spot qui sotto:

E qui sotto potete vedere anche un nuova…

View On WordPress
